input.sentences: today i went on a trip .
we took a train to get there .
it was a lot of fun doing that .
it got us to where we needed to be quickly .
output.sentences: We got our first toy train today, I was so happy.
I liked to set it up to look like it was going thru mountains.
It was so fun to watch all the minatures in action.
I set up my second train, it was a newer style.
I loved pretending it was real and playing with my trains.
